is.merkor.core
Interface Item

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Item>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RedisItem
public interface Item
extends java.lang.Comparable<Item>

An interface for implementations of lexical items.

    Attributes:
  • Long id, a unique id for the item
  • String lemma
  • int sense, the sense number of the item, default is 1 for monosemous items
  • String wordclass
  • boolean hasMoreSenses, indicates if there exists another item with the same lemma and wordclass having another sense number

    • Version:
    0.8
    Author:
    Anna B. Nikulasdottir

    getHasMoreSenses

    boolean getHasMoreSenses()
    Returns a boolean indicating if there exists another item with the same lemma and wordclass.

    Returns:
    true if there exists another item with the same lemma and wordclass, false otherwise.

    getWordpairCount

    int getWordpairCount()
    Returns the number of relations this item is a part of. That is, how many wordpairs contain this item.

    Returns:
    number of relations for this item
